name: Maryam Mirzakhani
quote: The beauty of mathematics only shows itself to more patient followers.
summary: Iranian mathematician and the first woman to win the Fields Medal, the highest honor in mathematics.
shortDescription: Maryam Mirzakhani was an Iranian mathematician and the first woman to win the Fields Medal. Her work in geometry and dynamical systems has had a profound impact on mathematics.

detailed_description.early_life: Born in Tehran, Iran, Maryam showed early talent in mathematics and won gold medals in the International Mathematical Olympiad.
detailed_description.stem_journey: Maryam earned her PhD at Harvard and became a professor at Stanford University. She made groundbreaking contributions to geometry and dynamical systems.
detailed_description.challenges: As a woman in mathematics, Maryam faced gender barriers, especially in Iran and in the global mathematics community.
detailed_description.achievements: First woman and first Iranian to win the Fields Medal. Made major advances in the theory of moduli spaces and Riemann surfaces.
detailed_description.legacy: Maryam's achievements inspire women and girls worldwide to pursue mathematics.
